issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Read compressed CSVs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10372](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10372). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice if arrow can read compressed csv files

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10372?focusedCommentId=17225643) by Roc Granada Verdú (Hoter11):*
I would also like for this to be implemented.

While the _read_csv_arrow_ function automatically detects compression: "_compression will be detected from the file extension and handled automatically_", the _open_dataset_ function does not. It breaks when trying to read a gzip csv, and there is not a parameter to specify the compression.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10372?focusedCommentId=17303415) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9685
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9685>
